text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Astonishing! Even trainers of legend 
have never won every G1 race!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Well done! Your feats will be remembered 
here for generations to come, you legend 
of Tracen Academy!!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Th-These tears of joy! You should 
receive the highest of accolades 
for the marvelous bond you've 
formed with your trainees.

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
I really can't thank you enough… for 
seeing my dream to fruition…!!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Well then, shall we continue to marvel 
at the pristine glitter of a chamber 
brimming with trophies?
